scripts.migrate: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npx knex migrate:latest --knexfile src/config/knexfile.ts
scripts.migrate:down: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npx knex migrate:down  --knexfile src/config/knexfile.ts
scripts.migrate:rollback:all: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npx knex migrate:rollback --all  --knexfile src/config/knexfile.ts
scripts.seed: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npx knex seed:run --knexfile src/config/knexfile.ts
scripts.migrate:test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test npx knex migrate:latest --knexfile src/config/knextfiletest.ts
scripts.migrate:down:test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test npx knex migrate:down  --knexfile src/config/knextfiletest.ts
scripts.migrate:rollback:all:test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test npx knex migrate:rollback --all  --knexfile src/config/knextfiletest.ts
scripts.seed:test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test npx knex seed:run --knexfile src/config/knextfiletest.ts
